name: swarm-supersymmetry-integration
purpose: Integrate Auralux Voice Stack into Supersymmetry (WASM)

agents.prompt: Port 'nucleus/auralux/*.ts' logic to a new Supersymmetry package '@sym/auralux'. Ensure it uses '@sym/wasm' for audio processing instead of Node.js buffers.
Wire '@sym/auralux' into '@sym/compute'. Create a WebGPU compute shader for VAD (Voice Activity Detection) if possible, or fallback to WASM.
Review the Supersymmetry constitution. Ensure the new Auralux integration respects the 'Decentralized Control Plane' architecture.
